Question.Subject: Can I text from Canada to the united states?
Question.Content: Ok maybe that isn't the right question, but my question is can you text from a united states number when your in canada, can you send texts to another united states number? And do you get charged for it? Im sorry if I couldn't say the question right. I hope somebody understands what I mean

ChosenAnswer: In short Yes. However not in all cases. If your (US) provider has a deal with a canadian wireless company, you texts and calls will go through. They will, however, cost a bunch. The only way to know for sure is to call 611, or your cell phone help line, and ask. The phones and networks are compatible, so the only reason it wouldn't work would be if you have, say, a cheap cell phone company..

Answers.Answer: Yes you can, but it will cost you lots of money unless you have an international plan.
